com.github.sbaudoin.yamllint

Class LintScanner

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.sbaudoin.yamllint.LintScanner

  • public class LintScanner
extends Object
    Is a wrapper to org.yaml.snakeyaml.scanner.ScannerImpl for easing the handling of some java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException that can occur with peekToken() and getToken() when there is no more tokens to get.
    See Also:
    ScannerImpl

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LintScanner(org.yaml.snakeyaml.reader.StreamReader reader)
      Constructor

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.yaml.snakeyaml.tokens.Token getToken()
      Unstacks and returns the current token and moves or null if there is no more tokens to be read in the input stream
      boolean hasMoreTokens()
      Tells if there are still some tokens to be scanned and returned by getToken() or peekToken()
      org.yaml.snakeyaml.tokens.Token peekToken()
      Returns the current token or null if there is no more tokens to be read in the input stream.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • peekToken

        public org.yaml.snakeyaml.tokens.Token peekToken()
        Returns the current token or null if there is no more tokens to be read in the input stream. The token remains in the stack.
        Returns:
        a Token or null if none found

      • getToken

        public org.yaml.snakeyaml.tokens.Token getToken()
        Unstacks and returns the current token and moves or null if there is no more tokens to be read in the input stream
        Returns:
        a Token or null if none found

      • hasMoreTokens

        public boolean hasMoreTokens()
        Tells if there are still some tokens to be scanned and returned by getToken() or peekToken()
        Returns:
        true if there are still token to come, false if not
